The user launches a [[Fire Release: Great Fireball Technique|fireball]] at the opponent, with the [[Blaze Release: Kagutsuchi|black flames]] enveloping the orange-coloured fire for increased substantial damage.

[[pt-br:Liberação de Chama: Técnica da Grande Bola de Fogo]]
